data.name: Bulb Boy: Jar of Despair
data.detailed_description:
There is no jam for dinner! Grandparaffine asks (´･_･`) Bulb Boy to fetch a jar from the basement, which is the beginning of a scary adventure.

The second part of the game from the creators of the award-winning Bulb Boy, loved by a quarter of a million people. This time we will experience extraordinary adventures inside a crumbled cellar.
The game includes:
- many scary mutant jam monsters (◞≼⓪≽◟⋌⋚⋛⋋◞≼⓪≽)
- graphics that will make you feel part of a 90s cartoon. ( ´థ౪థ)
- intuitive puzzles
- close-ups on disgusting details ༼;´༎ຶ ۝ ༎ຶ༽
- loveable characters (ꈍᴗꈍ)
- controller / keyboard / mouse - autoresponsive control
- ⓝⓞ ⓟⓞⓘⓝⓣ & ⓒⓛⓘⓒⓚ ⓝⓞⓝⓢⓔⓝⓢⓔ

data.short_description: There is no jam for dinner! Grandparaffine asks Bulb Boy (´･_･`) to fetch a jar from the basement, which is the beginning of a creepy adventure.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-6300U CPU @ 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 520
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please be aware that this game is designed with 16:9 in mind.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-6300U CPU @ 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 520
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
